code: import{GET_EVENTS,GET_EVENTS_FAIL,GET_EVENTS_SUCCESS,ADD_NEW_EVENT,ADD_EVENT_SUCCESS,ADD_EVENT_FAIL,UPDATE_EVENT,UPDATE_EVENT_SUCCESS,UPDATE_EVENT_FAIL,DELETE_EVENT,DELETE_EVENT_SUCCESS,DELETE_EVENT_FAIL,GET_CATEGORIES,GET_CATEGORIES_SUCCESS,GET_CATEGORIES_FAIL}from"./actionTypes";export var getEvents=function getEvents(){return{type:GET_EVENTS};};export var getEventsSuccess=function getEventsSuccess(events){return{type:GET_EVENTS_SUCCESS,payload:events};};export var getEventsFail=function getEventsFail(error){return{type:GET_EVENTS_FAIL,payload:error};};export var addNewEvent=function addNewEvent(event){return{type:ADD_NEW_EVENT,payload:event};};export var addEventSuccess=function addEventSuccess(event){return{type:ADD_EVENT_SUCCESS,payload:event};};export var addEventFail=function addEventFail(error){return{type:ADD_EVENT_FAIL,payload:error};};export var updateEvent=function updateEvent(event){return{type:UPDATE_EVENT,payload:event};};export var updateEventSuccess=function updateEventSuccess(event){return{type:UPDATE_EVENT_SUCCESS,payload:event};};export var updateEventFail=function updateEventFail(error){return{type:UPDATE_EVENT_FAIL,payload:error};};export var deleteEvent=function deleteEvent(event){return{type:DELETE_EVENT,payload:event};};export var deleteEventSuccess=function deleteEventSuccess(event){return{type:DELETE_EVENT_SUCCESS,payload:event};};export var deleteEventFail=function deleteEventFail(error){return{type:DELETE_EVENT_FAIL,payload:error};};export var getCategories=function getCategories(){return{type:GET_CATEGORIES};};export var getCategoriesSuccess=function getCategoriesSuccess(categories){return{type:GET_CATEGORIES_SUCCESS,payload:categories};};export var getCategoriesFail=function getCategoriesFail(error){return{type:GET_CATEGORIES_FAIL,payload:error};};
